file_content.text: Nice digs for a conspirator. Where I come from, place like this gets looted in a week.
We toured the tombs of Pengalan, but they were nothing like this.
And all built for a lie. A conspirator...
This is fantastic. This must be what Korriban is like.
Cipher... I don't even care that it's a monument to our enemy, it's too perfect.
All this for a conspirator who won the hearts of the Voss.
Not many people in our line of work are remembered so fondly.
In a thousand years, this tomb will be broken stone. You will be dead.
Natural monuments are failures.
Bas-Ton--I'm in position. Nothing in the sarcophagus but dust and a scroll.
Dust? No way the body decayed that fast on its own.
Send me a high-res image and bring the scroll back--dust sample too. We'll see what analysis turns up.
I'll head back to the teahouse.
On my way.
I'll save a seat for you.
What do you think this stuff is worth in the offworld markets?
Ever sell a Voss artifact?
I try not to wonder--I'm not leaving the family any time soon. Bas-Ton out.
Is there a lab in the back of your teahouse, or am I missing something?
You're hardly a scientist.
Imperial Intelligence has some men on Voss I can call in. Don't worry, I'll earn my pay.
